title: Create SDK integration guide and examples
description:
**As a** SDK consumer
**I want** comprehensive integration guide with examples
**So that** I can easily use Consoul SDK in my own applications

**Context:**
After the service layer is created (SOUL-245, 246, 247), developers need documentation to understand how to use the SDK. This includes:
- Conceptual overview of service architecture
- API reference for each service
- Integration examples (FastAPI, scripts, notebooks)
- Migration guide from direct SDK usage to service layer

**Technical Notes:**
- Create: docs/sdk/README.md (overview)
- Create: docs/sdk/integration-guide.md (comprehensive guide)
- Create: docs/sdk/api-reference.md (service APIs)
- Create: docs/sdk/examples/ (code examples directory)
- Update: mkdocs.yml to include SDK docs
- Include: Architecture diagrams
- Reference: examples/fastapi_server.py from SOUL-257

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** New SDK user
**When** Reading integration guide
**Then** Can successfully integrate SDK in <30 minutes

**Given** Developer needs API reference
**When** Checking api-reference.md
**Then** All service methods are documented

**Given** FastAPI integration needed
**When** Following examples
**Then** Can create working WebSocket server

**Given** Migration from old SDK usage
**When** Following migration guide
**Then** Can update code to use services

**Documentation Sections:**

**Overview (README.md):**
- What is Consoul SDK
- Service layer architecture
- When to use SDK vs CLI/TUI
- Quick start (5-line example)

**Integration Guide:**
- Installation (pip install consoul)
- Configuration (from_config patterns)
- ConversationService usage
- ToolService usage
- ModelService usage
- Error handling
- Best practices

**API Reference:**
- ConversationService API
- ToolService API
- ModelService API
- Data models (Token, ToolInfo, ModelInfo)
- Callback protocols

**Examples:**
- Simple chatbot script
- FastAPI WebSocket server (link to SOUL-257)
- Jupyter notebook example
- Custom approval provider
- Multi-user server

**Implementation Hints:**
- Use MkDocs Material for rendering
- Include code examples with syntax highlighting
- Add architecture diagrams (mermaid or images)
- Link to API reference from guide
- Provide copy-paste examples
- Tag as help-wanted for community contributions
